Class javachart.chart.StickChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.StickChart
public class StickChart
extends Chart
A StickChart draws vertical lines from 0 (or the specified Bar baseline) to each data point's Y value.

StickChart()
constructs a default chart
StickChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
StickChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class

drawGraph()
draws an entire chart to this chart's Graphic class
drawGraph(Graphics)
draws an entire chart to the specified Graphics class
getStick()
Inquire this chart's Stick component
getXAxis()
Inquires this chart's X Axis
getYAxis()
Inquires this chart's Y axis
setStick(Stick)
Installs a new Stick component for this chart
setXAxis(LabelAxis)
Installs a new LabelAxis for this chart
setYAxis(Axis)
Installs a new Axis for this chart
